title: Snow ball needs to change or go
body:
It's been at least a few months now, and it's not gotten much better since its initial release.

Giving an engage to EVERY champion is ridiculous. If it was limited to Udyr, Tryndamere, and maybe a few others which have little to no ability to engage, then sure fair enough -- it makes sense. Except it's not limited to them. Every ADC, mage, tank and assassin has it. Heck pretty much every character I see these days has snow ball and flash -- and of course they do, it's OP as hell.

At the very least it needs a nerf. Similar cooldown to flash, no damage, etc...

replies.body: it makes the game fun. Who cares if its not ballanced.

Because it's a game that revolves around skill?

I imagine there'd be an uproar if Riot introduced snow ball to Summoner's Rift.
Mark/Dash is the only thing in this game that keeps mobility creep under control.

Yet even the champions with great mobility can use it which negates the benefit of using it with champions that have poor mobility.

This ability should never have been available to every champion. There're just SO MANY that become OP with it. Like a Fizz with snow ball is practically unstoppable. No matter how good you position yourself, you're going to die. Not to mention Amumu.

And it shouldn't be spammable like it is.
Also when you hit snow ball you should automatically dash rather than being able to activate the dash whenever you want. That way if you shoot it you're committed to going in.
